segments.text: Hello . I sent out my laundry yesterday.Aren ' t they ready ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They'll be ready by this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no ! I'm leaving for Japan at 11 this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that right ? We're very sorry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought it was " the same day " service.Anyway , please do hurry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid we can't return it by 11 o'clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , then , would you send it to Japan , please ?
segments.speaker: S1
